programme.title: 30 Minutes or Less
programme.desc: After Dwayne and Travis failed to get the money to open a massage parlor, they kidnap a pizza delivery man and make him wear a vest with time bomb, and force him to steal the $ 100,000 needed to finance their project within 10 hours.(n)

programme.title: The Art of Self-Defense
programme.desc: In an attempt to learn how to defend himself after an attack left him feeling helpless, Casey joins a local karate studio and quickly attracts the attention of the instructor, Sensei, earning himself an invitation to the elusive night classes where a shocking discovery awaits him.(n)

programme.title: 22 Jump Street
programme.desc: Officers Schmidt (Jonah Hill) and Jenko (Channing Tatum) go undercover at a local college to catch a criminal ring inside a fraternity house. But when Jenko meets a kindred spirit on the football team and Schmidt infiltrates the bohemian art major scene, they start to question their partnership.(n)

programme.title: The Other Guys
programme.desc: Two new York detectives, through a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity, gain a reputation for being among the best city-wide, but things are not exactly as they were thinking, especially when they investigate David Ershon.(n)

programme.title: Logan Lucky
programme.desc: Brothers Jimmy and Clyde embark on a daring mission to pull off a robbery during a NASCAR race in North Carolina.(n)

programme.title: Coach Carter
programme.desc: In 1999, Ken Carter accepts a job to coach the high school basketball team, in the lower-class area of Richmond. Carter, who is a star athlete, is disappointed with his team's attitude and performance, and decides to impose strict rules to improve his team and teach them the importance of academic success.(n)

programme.title: Scary Movie
programme.desc: A sarcastic comedy-horror movie about an 18-year-old who receives a threatening phone call, only to die later under ridiculous circumstances. The next day a group of friends stay in the house to get away from a storm, but are subjected to a series of horrifying events that makes fun of the famous horror movies of that time.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible - Ghost Protocol
programme.desc: The IMF is involved in a bombing in the Kremlin, Ethan Hunt and his team are trying to pursue the terrorist Hendricks who have access to the secret codes of Russian nuclear weapons, prompting the US president to launch the Ghost Protocol program, which makes Ethan and his team to take responsibility for the bombing while allowing them to escape to find those responsible.

programme.title: Daddy's Home
programme.desc: A step-father finds himself threatened by fierce competition when his step-children's father, who is way more cool than him, shows up suddenly.

programme.title: Fast & Furious presents: Hobbs & Shaw
programme.desc: A spin-off to The Fast and the Furious franchise, where US diplomatic agent, Luke Hobbs, unexpectedly allies with outcast Deckard Shaw to save the world from a cyber-genetically enhanced villain.

programme.title: Robin Hood
programme.desc: When he returns from the war to find that the corrupt Sheriff of Nottingham has seized his land, Robin of Loxley comes to realize the extent of the corruption underlying England's Crusades, leaving him to join forces with his best friend and an Arabian warrior to challenge the English crown.

programme.title: The Magnificent Seven
programme.desc: The film revolves around the arrival of seven armed men, from the Old West to a remote village, in order to help its people, in their fight against an evil gang trying take advantage of the village and the people.

programme.title: The Hateful Eight
programme.desc: A play-off on John Sturge's 1960 film "The Magnificent Seven". The movie is set at the end of the nineteenth century, about a group of people being held inside a ruined building because of a rough snowstorm. Rath (Kurt Russell), who works as an bounty hunter, was escorting Daisy Domergue (Jennifer Jason Leigh) to court and gets encountered by four strangers.

programme.title: Murder on the Orient Express
programme.desc: Hercule Poirot investigates the mysterious murder of a famous businessman on the Orient Express.

programme.title: Scary Movie 2
programme.desc: Four students are invited by their professor to a haunted house, on an experiment to see the effects of not sleeping for a week, in this spoof comedy.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible- Rogue Nation
programme.desc: Ethan and his team embark on their most impossible mission yet: putting an end to the “Syndicate”; an international grime organization aiming to destroy the IMF.

programme.title: Daddy's Home 2
programme.desc: As Brad and Dusty finally learned how to get along, they face a new challenge when their intrusive dads come to visit during Christmas.

programme.title: Garfield
programme.desc: The lazy cat Garfield is annoyed when his owner, Jon, gets a new dog in order to impress his old high school crush Liz. When the dog, Odie, is locked outside one day by Garfield, he runs away and is subsequently kidnapped. It's up to Garfield and his animal friends to rescue him.

programme.title: War of the Worlds
programme.desc: In this Sci-Fi, a thunderstorm hits the world and threatens the human race, amid chaos caused by strange beings who arrived to attack Earth. Ray is a divorced father whose children are staying with him for the weekend, and he will fight till the end to protect them.

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: In the near future, a special police unit is able to arrest murderers before they commit their crimes. Captain John Anderton, an officer from that unit, is himself accused of a future murder that will happen in the next 36 hours. What makes the situation worse, is that Anderton doesn't even know the victim.

programme.title: Total Recall
programme.desc: In a world devastated by a global war, except for Western Europe (UFB) and Australia (the Colony), Douglas Quaid believes he is a factory worker until he discovers real memories of being a high-profile agent at UFB after visiting Rekall, a recreational company that implants false memories. A series of chases and clues reveal the plan to eliminate the Colony and only Quaid can "kill" the plan.

programme.title: Watchmen
programme.desc: In 1985, when a superhero ( the Comedian) die in mysterious circumstances, his colleague (Rorschach) attempts to uncover the circumstances of this crime. Little by little, old comrades meet again in the face of an unknown danger.

programme.title: Hellboy
programme.desc: Torn between his allegiance to two different worlds, Hellboy struggles with the fact that accepting his real heritage might lead to an apocalypse, all while resisting the machinations of a witch intent on destroying the world.

programme.title: Scary Movie 3
programme.desc: Cindy Campbell works as an investigative reporter, and is required to investigate a case where a mysterious video tape is said to kill whoever watches it in seven days.

He fights evil in all its forms, with his super abilities that have generated thanks to a genetically-modified spider's bite.(n)

programme.title: The Amazing Spider-Man 2
programme.desc: With the appearance of Electro, Spider-Man must confront an enemy far more powerful than he. And as his old friend, Harry Osborn, returns, Peter Parker comes to realize that all of his enemies have one thing in common: OsCorp.(n)

programme.title: Spider-Man: Far From Home
programme.desc: Peter Parker and his friends go on a summer break to Europe, where Peter finds himself trying to save his friends from the evil hands of Mysterio.(n)

programme.title: Terminator: Genisys
programme.desc: When John Connor, Human Resistance leader, launches a final attack on Skynet (a global artificial intelligence operating system called "Genisys" leading a machines' rise against mankind), Skynet sends a T-800 Terminator to 1987 to kill Sarah, John's mother. Kyle, John's right-hand man, follows the T-800 and Sarah re-programmes it into "Pops" to form a team in a deadly adventure to destroy Genisys.(n)

programme.desc: Henry Brogan is an unparalleled assassin who is suddenly targeted and pursued by another young operative who can predict his every move. In facing this real life-threat, Henry discovers that this lethal young operative is a 25-year-old clone of himself.(n)

Nina
programme.desc: A biopic that depicts the life of the iconic jazz music star, Nina Simone, shining a light on her career, the struggles she had to endure to rise to fame, and her relationship with her manager Clifton Henderson.

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: The beautiful Snow White gets into a fierce conflict with the Evil Queen. The Huntsman tries to train her to withstand these evil forces, but is it enough for her to defeat them.

programme.title: The American
programme.desc: After he survives an assassination attempt in Sweden, the contract killer Jack flees to Rome where he is hired to build a custom sniper rifle for a client, as he vows that this will be his last job.

programme.title: The Eagle
programme.desc: In 140 AD, twenty years after the disappearance of the entire Ninth Legion , Roman commander Marcus Aquila arrives from Rome to solve the mystery. Accompanied by his British slave Esca, he has to confront brutal tribes, make peace again, and restore the lost legion's golden emblem.

programme.title: American Heist
programme.desc: After taking the fall for a crime that his brother committed with him, Frankie is released after serving his time, only to discover that his brother has gone on the straight and narrow. But the penniless Frankie has only one way of getting his life back: one last job that he drags his brother into.

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: The story of two detectives, Sonny Crocket and Ricardo Tubbs, who are investigating a crime and somehow end up having their personal lives affected by their professional lives.

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: The film revolves around the history and politics of the reign of King Arthur, during the collapse of the Roman Empire, the outbreak of skirmishes over power in countries far from the empire, and the role of the Knights of the Round Table.

programme.title: Life on the Line
programme.desc: The film revolves around a crew working in the most difficult circumstances, repairing electrical wiring but things become harder when they face a deadly storm.

programme.title: Heist
programme.desc: Desperate to afford his daughter's surgery, Luke Vaughn agrees with a coworker to rob the casino they work in. When the heist goes south, they are forced on the run, leading them to take a city bus hostage as they try to flee both the cops and their gangster boss's hitman.

programme.title: Ace the Case
programme.desc: Olivia, a 10-year-old girl whose mother goes on a weekend trip,leaving her with her older seventeen-year-old brother, Miles, in charge. On the first night, she wakes up late and walks her dog when she witnesses the kidnapping of a young woman on the streets of New York.

programme.title: The Frozen Ground
programme.desc: An Alaskan State Trooper Jack Halcombe is on a mission to end the killing spree of a serial killer. When a seventeen year old girl escapes his clutches, she offers key information that sets the manhunt back on track.

programme.title: Switched
programme.desc: A bullied teenager makes a wish for her tormentor, the most popular girl in school, to experience life through her own eyes. But when her wish gets granted, she is shocked when she switches bodies with her nemesis.

programme.title: Zeroville
programme.desc: When an aspiring actor heads to Hollywood in the transitional period of the cinema industry, the two tattoos of Montgomery Clift and Elizabeth Taylor he has put him under scrutiny as he becomes an object of interest, eventually impressing a beautiful actress and embarking on a dream-like journey.

programme.title: The Tracker
programme.desc: Aiden Hakansson decides to travel to a deserted village in Italy where his wife and daughter were kidnapped fifteen years earlier, as he sets out to seek revenge on those responsible.

programme.title: Eagle vs Shark
programme.desc: When Lily falls for Jarrod, she decides to go with him to his hometown as he plans to get back at an old bully. As she meets his family, she discovers that they are just as weird as he is.

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: Anne Marie is so passionate about surfing that she believes that nothing can come between her and her surfboard. She goes to Hawaii without telling her parents, and stays in a hut with her rebellious younger sister and 3 others. She vigorously prepares for a surfing competition, but things get complicated when Matt enters her life, causing her to lose her balance in the chaos of love.(n)

programme.title: Sweetness in the Belly
programme.desc: As she flees the civil war in Ethiopia, Lilly seeks refuge in her parents' homeland in England, quickly finding purpose as she seeks to reunite people with their families with the help of her friend Amina, all while hiding her relationship with the doctor, Aziz.(n)
